What is the EB2-NIW visa?

You may be eligible for an employment-based, second preference visa if you are a member of the professions holding an advanced degree or its equivalent, or a person who has exceptional ability.

What are business plan requirements?

In general, a business plan EB-2 NIW comprises four sections that include; 1. Description of the services a business offers 2. Details of the management team 3. Personal Plan 4. Description of financial projection and marketing strategies

How can you help with my VISA business plan?

Our team of Immigration Business Plan Writers work with a variety of industries and businesses to deliver custom EB2-NIW, E-2 & L-1 Visa business plans.

EB-2/NIW Business Plan

Candidates need an advanced degree and progressive work experience in a relevant field. Applicants must also demonstrate a good ability in arts, business, and science. After this, applicants need to show that their proposed endeavor has national importance.

People applying for NIW as an entrepreneur or EB-2 business visa need a comprehensive business plan with the application. A thorough business plan EB-2 NIW is important if your proposed endeavor is a business.

In short, if you're a startup, you need an EB-2/NIW Business Plan to strengthen your application.

Business Plan Content

Some basic requirements of your national interest waiver business plan

Executive summary.

Problem, solution and introduction.

Current Situation.

Understanding of the market.

Contribution

Merits of working in the field.

National Importance

How it will substantially benefit prospectively the nation

Professional Expertise and Experience

Foreign national is well positioned.

Financial Forecast

Economic impact of its operations.
